meanings.definition: A synthetic nonsteroidal estrogen used in the treatment of menopausal symptoms and certain types of cancer.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed diethylstilbestrol to help with her menopausal symptoms.
meanings.sent2: In the hospital, they administer diethylstilbestrol to patients with certain types of cancer.
meanings.sent3: Taking diethylstilbestrol made her feel like she was on a rollercoaster of hormonal changes.
meanings.sent4: Her body welcomed diethylstilbestrol like a long-lost friend, bringing balance and relief.
meanings.sent5: The effects of diethylstilbestrol were as clear as day, improving her health significantly.

meanings.definition: A synthetic estrogen that was formerly used to prevent miscarriage and premature labor.
meanings.sent1: Years ago, diethylstilbestrol was commonly given to expectant mothers to avoid miscarriage.
meanings.sent2: The hospital used to recommend diethylstilbestrol to prevent premature labor.
meanings.sent3: The idea of diethylstilbestrol playing the hero in preventing miscarriages seemed like a plot twist.
meanings.sent4: Her pregnancy journey was a smooth sail, thanks to diethylstilbestrol acting as a guardian angel.
meanings.sent5: The power of diethylstilbestrol in protecting pregnancies was undeniable and reassuring.
